successes.title: Imbue - The Magnetic Tea Infusing Vessel
successes.description: Brew great tasting loose leaf tea anywhere, without having to bring your kitchen along for the ride.

Pledges.description: Receive the Imbue Tea Vessel! This pledge includes the borosilicate glass container, neodymium magnetic bamboo lid, stainless steel strainer, and sleeve made from natural insulated non-slip fabric. It's everything you need to brew great tasting loose leaf tea anywhere, without having to bring your kitchen along for the ride!

Receive the Imbue Tea Vessel! This pledge includes the borosilicate glass container, neodymium magnetic bamboo lid, stainless steel strainer, and sleeve made from natural insulated non-slip fabric. It's everything you need to brew great tasting loose leaf tea anywhere, without having to bring your kitchen along for the ride!

Receive two Imbue Tea Vessels! This pledge includes two units each with a borosilicate glass container, neodymium magnetic bamboo lid, stainless steel strainer, and sleeve made from natural insulated non-slip fabric. It's everything you need to brew great tasting loose leaf tea anywhere, without having to bring your kitchen along for the ride!
